text:
It's quite easy for the ocean to be warm, we have been in a warm period since 1855, sadly it ended in 2009.
At the beginning of the last ice age as the temperature fell through the floor the CO2 was heading for the ceiling and far higher than today, the warming fanatics would have had some serious graph bending to hide it. Currently CO2 has gone up by a micro amount and it's cooling. Perhaps we are seeing a replay of the Catenary Ice age.
USA has cut it's CO2 by the biggest amount in the world by swapping coal for gas, just as the UK did during the 70's, and most of the EU has done the same. Most of their Industries were moved abroad to meet targets.
There is still no evidence the sea is rapidly warming up, that is a alarmist statement and it's not rapidly rising either.
China is using more coal because it's making all of ours stuff.
There is still no evidence that CO2 causes Global warming anywhere.

text:
Earth Climate - Precipitation
According to the informational space diagnostics of the ICD (diagtor.com.ua), catastrophic warming will be observed on Earth from 2000 to 2300. In the coldest places of the Earth, the climate will be at the equator. Precipitation in South America, North America, Europe, Australia is significantly reduced. Take, for example, the Poltava region, in which precipitation will be 664 mm in 2000, 655 mm in 2020, 598 mm in 2050, 599 mm in 2100, and 577 mm in 2200. In Australia, rainfall will also decrease: in 2000 - 222 mm, in 2020 - 220 mm, in 2050 - 200 mm, in 2100 188 mm, in 2200 - 176 mm. An increase in temperature and a decrease in precipitation will cause drainage of the soil and a significant decrease in yields, there will come a famine and this will continue for a long time, and measures must now be taken to solve this problem.
ICD on request makes a forecast of changes in temperature, precipitation and other parameters related to Earth's climate change.
Ermakov P, professor
author: Petr Ermakov

text: Here's an impossible proposal. Close the U.S. Pentagon and turn it into a massive botanical garden. Dismantle all nuclear power plants and destroy all nuclear weapons. Dismantle their nuclear club that threatens Russia with nuclear weapons. Membership costs a trillion dollars a year, it's money down the toilet, utter stupidity. The trillion dollars a year should go to Indonesia to help protect the jungle and assist Indigenous people to return to their forested homes. International ban all products with palm oil to stop any ravaging the forests. Also of the trillion dollars assist Central and South America to save and protect the rainforests there. Also protect the Indigenous people who have always lives there. Same for the entire continent of Africa. Bring peace to these troubled nations who have been heavily funded and given weapons to divert their attention while the voracious greed has been ripping off their resources. Give the money to N.G.O.'s so they can give the funds directly to individuals for entrepreneurial and starting their own business, and for technical education and training that help the people to rebuild or build better infrastructure and sustainable diversified economies meanwhile preserving wilderness areas and allow Indigenous people to live and husband them because no one has more proven experience or knowledge in caring for these once healthy habitats. Restore all Indigenous peoples to their rightful lands, Islands, and Atols. Treat these people's as the sovereign nations that they are and have always been. Accord all sovereign Indigenous peoples their rightful seats at the United Nations general assembly and within the security. Indigenous peoples are a crucial key to securing life on this planet. All the developed and recovering nations are grappling with problems that their societies had solved hundreds of years ago. Indigenous peoples were the advanced civilizations that truly understood how to live with the earth and how to care for and protect the great diversity of life. Those who truly care about the survival of the planet and preserve the great diversity of plant, insect, fish, birds, and animals, ought to start admitting to the simple truth, Indigenous people have the intelligence and wisdom to protect all life and how to build a true nation without all the problems and injustices that the 'developed' nations are plagued with. text:
For Pete's sake.. Not Buttigieg.. Does anyone look beyond the headlines anymore? Society has gotten so used to reading headlines and ignoring the bigger story that we can't see the forest from the trees. Yes, the global temperature is rising. That doesn't mean it will increase until we all die. 


Look at all the facts. What else is currently happening?... Our poles are shifting at an increasing rate. Our polar north is somewhere in Siberia right now. It isn't in what we know of as the north pole.. And what happens at our poles? Everything freezes.. So if the poles move, the old poles will naturally thaw and the new poles will freeze over. If it stops in Siberia, cool.. That's frozen anyhow. It might head down by Japan too though, freezing over the Sea of Japan.


The point is, the polar shift is why Antarctica and the Greenland are thawing out right now.. Once it settles, the new poles will freeze over and things will return to normal pretty much. The Equator will adjust too slightly, which will make some regions permanently warmer. Regions that stray from the equator will become lush again. 


It isn't the end, but it will take a lot of adjustment..

text: NO. Signs are not being ignored, GOOD FORESTRY MANAGEMENT is being ignored. AND if you do your own research on the topic, it is openly known and acknowledged by most all of those involved in the process.  Australian forests are dominated by gum trees that regenerate by fire and are evolutionary programmed to spread fire by released highly volatile oils.  As such it is an imperative practice in the management of such forests to clear out brush and to remove smaller trees and lessen the ability of fire to spread. Did they do that?  NO ... in fact the federal government of Australia that owns/controls much of the land that is burning actually reduced the budgets for forest management ... it is as if they WANTED large fires to SCARE the electorate and to push for more climate change carbon taxation and energy AUSTERITY - both of which the Australian people are coming to realize are a FRAUD, hence why the government leadership seeks a way to scare people and drive them into submission.

author: M. Andersson

text:
Did you know that flue gas is usually 1200 ¬∞ C hot? Flue gas is emitted when burning coal. Air has almost the same thermal conductivity as flue gas since both largely consist of nitrogen. The exhaust gases/flue gas must be let out.

This leads to great efficiency losses.

Exhaust gases would have to be kept inside to increase efficiency. That would not work with coal. So you need something else to heat the gas.

For example, you can use electric heating elements made from silicon carbide. They easily heat the air to 1200 ¬∞ C and produce no exhaust gases, which is why the air can be kept inside. The electrical heating elements made of silicon carbide use electricity to generate the heat.

For example, a coal-fired power plant produces 100 megawatts of electricity and requires 1200 ¬∞ C, which is generated when coal is burned. What if you generate the 1200 ¬∞ C electrically and have a much higher efficiency? The heating elements consume far less than 100 megawatts.


I would like to hear your opinion on this.

text:
Yeah, what is going on in the world today? Not so much.
 
2019 remains cooler than 2016.  Of course we all know that according to NASA 2017 was cooler than 2016 and 2018 was cooler than 2017.  How is it that, according CO2 can increase 12 ppm, about 3%, and the earth cools.
 
USA's NOAA data demonstrates the current climate trend is one of fewer intense storms versus the number of tropical storms. The ratio of Hurricanes (> 120 kph winds) to Storms (>65 kph winds) has been on a downwards trend now for 150 years. 
That the oceans have become calmer is supported by the work of Klotzbach and Landsea (2015) who reported 5 years ago "the global frequency of category 4 and 5 hurricanes has shown a downward trend between 1990 and 2014. Accumulated cyclone energy globally has experienced a large and significant downward trend during the same period. "
